response.original_title: ゲーメスト ビデオ VOL.2 餓狼伝説 2
response.overview: Gamest Video Vol. 2: Fatal Fury 2  Color / 60 min / Stereo / April 1, 1993  Shinseisha GV-002  A new legend begins now!  The "King of Fighters" returns...  A feast of battles between destined warriors!  The sequel to the stunning debut of "Fatal Fury,"  this video captures every detail of the smash-hit fighting game, "Fatal Fury 2"!  Perfect battles against the computer, thrilling duels,  and the usual street performances—it's got it all!  The "Fatal Fury 2" video, a compilation of all the hard work from the Gamest editorial team,  is sure to satisfy any fan.  With a digest of the Fatal Fury series and introductions to all the characters, this one's got it!
response.title: GAMEST VIDEO VOL.2 - FATAL FURY 2
